main-form.footer: Developed by: Tulio de Oliveira, Koen Deforche, Sharon Cassol, Andrew Rambaut and Anne-Mieke Vandamme.

start-form.title: REGA HIV Subtyping Tool Version 2.0
start-form.note:
This tool is designed to use phylogenetic methods in order to identify the subtype of a specific sequence. The sequence is analysed for recombination using bootscanning methods.
Note for batch analysis: The REGA subtype tool accepts up to 1000 sequences at a time.
